name: test_pure_api_registration_and_login

statusDetails.message: AssertionError: Failed to register user: 422 {"address":["The address field must be an array."],"password":["The given password has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different password."]}

description:
Test Case 1 (Semi-Senior): Pure API Testing.
Demonstrates ability to test backend systems without relying on UI.

steps.name: 1. Register a new user via POST /users/register
